long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Whatfix Comments is a platform that can enable seamless collaboration on any webpage.

Inspired by the commenting capabilities on tools like Google docs, Whatfix Comments makes collaboration available anywhere on the web in real time, and makes it effortless to convey your message.


Key features of Whatfix Comments: 

Add Comments Anywhere
Start a conversation or provide feedback directly on the content by clicking the “+” icon on comments

Real-Time Collaboration
Collaborate with your team in real-time. Teams are notified on Comments widget and over emails as soon as you add a comment

Tag Your Teammates
By simply using “@” in a comment, you can tag your teammates ensuring their input is sought and their attention is directed to relevant content

Share context automatically
With every comments, the page link where comet is and the screenshot of that page is also shared with the people you tag

Organize and Manage
Effortlessly manage and filter comments by domain or unread status. Stay organized and focused on what matters most to your team
